nodes.long_description: DodgeALL is a high-intensity VR game that puts your agility and reflexes to the test. Engage in a world where the only rule is to dodge everything that comes your way! With immersive 3D environments and physics-based gameplay, each level presents a new challenge, offering endless replayability. Dodge, weave, and strategize in this adrenaline-fueled game, where your skill determines your survival. Are you ready to DodgeALL?
nodes.short_description: DodgeALL is an adrenaline-fueled VR game that tests your reflexes in immersive 3D environments. With physics-based gameplay, each level is a new challenge. Can you weave, dodge, and survive in an arena where everyone is throwing things at you?

nodes.change_log: BUGFIX: Pausing pauses characters and obstacles.

FEATURE: Characters now rotate towards obstacle before picking up, then rotate back before throwing.
FEATURE: AlienPlanet > Virus shoot particle fog from plants when launching.
FEATURE: All virus types now have new audio.
BUGFIX: Custom levels are now overwritten.
BUGFIX: Transition from Health and Safety Warning to Main Menu is faster.
BUGFIX: General > Reset Preferences "reset" button has text again.
BUGFIX: Custom level abilities now unlock abilities correctly.
BUGFIX: Non-floating obstacles cause correct damage.
CHANGE: Scoreboard > Rate Level button removed for Twitch mode and custom levels.
CHANGE: Throw animations are more accurate when letting go.
CHANGE: Virus01-09 changed attributes and worlds.
CHANGE: Virus10 removed.
CHANGE: Increased number of cannon shot particle FX.
CHANGE: AlienPlanet > Crystal clone distance depends on direction.
CHANGE: Custom level scoreboard no longer shows leaderboards.
CHANGE: Custom levels must now specify AbilityUnlockAll to allow abilities.
CHANGE: Custom hardcore levels now have all abilities unlocked.
CHANGE: CannonBalls cause less damage.

FEATURE: Twitch mode > chat can now win or lose.
FEATURE: Twitch mode > chat leaderboards.
FEATURE: Twitch mode > now allows abilities to be disabled.
FEATURE: Twitch mode > now allows campaign selection.
FEATURE: Twitch mode > added optional minimum bits for VIP mode.
FEATURE: Twitch mode > users now have customizable cooldown before launching again.
FEATURE: Twitch mode > portal worlds are now randomized.
FEATURE: Twitch mode > added max speed (that chat can specify when launching floating obstacles).
FEATURE: Obstacle spin speed now depends on launch speed.
BUGFIX: Cleaned up Pirates arena lighting.
BUGFIX: Obstacles now face player when picked up and thrown.
BUGFIX: Characters no longer get stuck in pickup/throw animation if too many launches requested.
BUGFIX: Twitch mode all users can launch obstacles unless VIP mode is activated.
BUGFIX: Twitch mode "bit leader" can no longer launch unlimited obstacles in VIP mode.
BUGFIX: Sliders can now be adjusted by clicking/dragging the slider directly.
BUGFIX: SciFi > GaussLaser lifetime now depends on launch speed.
BUGFIX: SciFi > DroneCopter has more accurate colliders.
BUGFIX: SciFi arena texture lighting fixed.
BUGFIX: Twitch mode > chat commands ignored after max obstacles launched.
CHANGE: Pirates > Skull no longer rotates randomly.
CHANGE: Dodging clones no longer heal or cause healing particles.
CHANGE: Smashing and slicing obstacles heals slightly less.
CHANGE: SciFi > GaussLaser max speed capped at 10.
CHANGE: Changed minimum and maximum speeds of floating obstacles.
CHANGE: SciFi > PenroseTriangle now has random spin on 3 axes.
CHANGE: Twitch mode > don't show superfluous floating messages (close call, score bonus, dodge streak).
CHANGE: Pirates > Spear flies randomly flies in a straight line or spins.

FEATURE: Obstacles are now resized based on Guardian Boundary.
FEATURE: Tutorial character now poofs away.
BUGFIX: Pirates > Spear now flies in a relatively straight line.
BUGFIX: Pirates > Spyglass tumbles properly again.
BUGFIX: Hands no longer get stuck floating somewhere.
BUGFIX: SciFi > SpaceDebris now targets lower.
BUGFIX: Download all leaderboard scores at startup.
BUGFIX: Characters now wait for previous launch to finish before launching new obstacles.
BUGFIX: Laser and GaussLaser can target player much lower.
BUGFIX: Optional log upload no longer causes headset to lock up.
BUGFIX: Endless levels iterate correctly (regression).
BUGFIX: If intro character was disabled and health & safety window was closed, TV was not shown on main menu.
BUGFIX: Fixed platform outer rings fading issues.
CHANGE: Removed (unused) Main Controller and Head Sizer settings from Player Settings.
CHANGE: Custom "hardcore" levels are a bit easier and less random.
CHANGE: Intro character only plays on first startup (can be re-enabled in game settings).

VERSION: 0.42.0.1
BUGFIX: Players without a guardian can now play normally.
BUGFIX: Pausing during tutorial shows correct TVs.
BUGFIX: Pausing during tutorial hides/restores controller and hints.
BUGFIX: Pausing during tutorial hides/restores any active message.
BUGFIX: Characters no longer pickup obstacles twice before launching an obstacle.
CHANGE: Removed some useless Health & Safety warning text.
CHANGE: Added black outline to HUD text to make it more visible.

VERSION: 0.42.0.0
FEATURE: Obstacles now have shadows.
FEATURE: Added useful tooltips to the Main Menu.
BUGFIX: Platform heights now match floor height (was off by an inch/2.51cm - did anyone notice?).
CHANGE: Starter campaign levels are harder and faster (that will affect leaderboards, sorry people with high/low scores!).
CHANGE: Tutorial levels are slightly less boring.
CHANGE: Set OVRManager > Tracking Origin Type from STAGE to FLOOR mode to allow recentering.
BUGFIX: GlennerooVR logo is now less dirty.
BUGFIX: If error occurs during optional diagnostic upload, don't retry or annoy dear user.
BUGFIX: Tutorial skip button no longer stays green after skipping.
BUGFIX: Cutlass and Parrot now fly at your face as expected.
BUGFIX: Obstacles can now fly lower (for people who like to cheat lying down).
BUGFIX: Obstacles no longer bounce after collision.
BUGFIX: PenroseTriangle now waits before revealing its true form.
BUGFIX: SciFiMedBay viruses no longer launch above turrets.
BUGFIX: Clones now all die at edge of platform.
BUGFIX: Clones now all play audio.
INTERNAL: Upgraded to Unity 6.
